name: Lightpollution
0:
”alexa, open light pollution”
”what is the light pollution”
”tell me the light pollution”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: light pollution
des:
Light pollution. A light pollution estimator for a specific city and country.

It returns a light pollution score out of 10, for a specific city and country in Europe.

This skill works for Europe only at the moment. The information is not being stored, only used for the session duration.
